title: 1936 Harry Fraser Ghost Town ( Harry Carey, Ruth Findlay)

sources.title: 1936HarryFraserGhostTownHarryCareyRuthFindlay
sources.description: An old miner is ambushed by outlaws trying to steal the $10,000 he is carrying to start up a new mine. A passing cowboy comes to the miner's aid, but winds up getting blamed for the attack. Cast Harry Carey ... Cheyenne Harry Morgan  David Sharpe ... Bud  Ruth Findlay ... Billie Blair  Jane Novak ... Rose, gang moll  Lee Shumway ... Boss Morrell  Ed Cassidy ... Sheriff Blair  Roger Williams ... Henchman Gannon  Phil Dunham ... Abe Rankin  Earl Dwire ... Jim McCall  Chuck Morrison ... Henchman Blackie Hawkes  Sonny the Horse ... Sonny, Cheyenne's Horse  Bartlett A. Carre ... Slim Horace Murphy ... Henry Hal Price ... Deputy Jed  Francis Walker ... Deputy Frank Director Harry Fraser Story by Harry Fraser (as Monroe Talbot) Screenplay by Harry Fraser (as Weston Edwards) Produced by William Berke Cinematography Robert E. Cline Film Editing Arthur A. Brooks Art Direction by Jim Morahan Music Lee Zahler Assistant Director Louis Germomprez Details Country USA Release Date: February 15, 1936 Production Co: William Berke Productions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
